title: New: MIAMIGO – Opinions
content:
Brighton once again proving to be a hotspot for exciting new music, ‘dark pop’ duo MIAMIGO impress on their debut track, Opinions.

Mixing the out-and-out festival-ready pop capabilities of Bastille with added positive of not being intensely annoying. Most likely initially written in a cramped bedroom somewhere, it’s quite a talent to be able to compose with such broad horizons. Check out Opinions below.

p.s. Isn’t there a part of you that wishes they were called MIHERMANO?
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
